DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study investigate evaluate bioequivalence food effect SEP 190-102 Japanese healthy subject assess pharmacokinetics parameter .
DOC.brief_title: A Bioequivalence Food Effect Study SEP-190 Japanese Healthy Subjects ( Study SEP 190-102 )
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion ; 1 . Participants give full explanation objective detail study start screen give write consent base free 2 . Japanese healthy male adult volunteer 3 . Participants 20 54 year age time obtain write consent 4 . Body Mass Index ( BMI ) 18.5 kg/m2 25.0 kg/m2 time screen Exclusion criterion ; 1 . Participants present illness history allergy drug food , seasonal allergy 2 . Participants known history gastrointestinal surgery ( e.g. , hepatectomy , nephrotomy , etc . ) may affect pharmacokinetic evaluation 3 . Participants find clinically abnormal finding medical history , symptoms clinical finding , vital sign , electrocardiogram , laboratory parameter require medical treatment ( ) , impaired organ function 4 . Participants know suspected history alcohol drug abuse , positive urine drug screen 5 . Participants positive hepatitis B surface antigen ( HBs antigen ) , hepatitis C virus ( HCV ) antibody , human immunodeficiency virus ( HIV ) positive , positive syphilis screen 6 . Participants underwent blood transfusion within 12 week prior , whose 400 mL whole blood collect within 12 week prior , whose 200 mL whole blood collect within 4 week prior study drug administration
